name: Jon Stevens
description: '''Jon Stevens''' (born 8 October 1961) is a New Zealand singer, best known as the [[lead singer]] of the band [[Noiseworks]] in 1986–1992, the portrayal of [[Judas]] in a 1992 Australian production of ''[[Jesus Christ Superstar]]'', and as the lead singer for the Australian rock band [[INXS]] in 2000–2003 after the death of the band's original lead singer [[Michael Hutchence]].
